description: Fourth (unsigned) column sequence of triangle A062138 (generalized a=5 Laguerre).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: (1+24*x+84*x^2+56*x^3)/(1-x)^12.a(n)=A062138(n+3, 3) = (n+3)!*binomial(n+8, 8)/3!.If we define f(n,i,x)= sum(sum(binomial(k,j)*stirling1(n,k)*stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j),j=i..k),k=i..n) then a(n-3)=(-1)^(n-1)*f(n,3,-9), (n>=3). [From _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
